mapper.sql: id, inCode, bookCode, typeCode, inNum, status, createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT t.id, t.inCode, t.refCode, t.bookCode, t2.bookName, t3.typeName, t.inNum, t.`status`, CASE t.`status` WHEN 0 THEN '待归还' WHEN 1 THEN '已归还' ELSE '' END AS statusName, t.returnTime, t.createTime, t.createName AS returnName, TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY,t.createTime,t.returnTime) AS `day` FROM cs_in_stock_record AS t LEFT JOIN cs_book_info t2 ON t.bookCode = t2.bookCode LEFT JOIN cs_book_type t3 ON t.typeCode = t3.`code`
AND t.inCode LIKE '${inCode}%'
AND t.refCode LIKE '${refCode}%'
